Attribute.Value: 西南医院量表\肌肉骨骼功能评分简表（SMFA）

Attribute.Name: RecordID
Attribute.Value: 西南医院骨关节康复相关评定\肌肉骨骼功能评分简表（SMFA）

Attribute.Name: FileName
Attribute.Value: 西南医院骨关节康复相关评定\肌肉骨骼功能评分简表（SMFA）

Element.Text: Part I：How much difficulty do you have with the damage or arthritis on your physical conditions in your daily living of this week
1 point None 2 points Mild 3 points Moderate 4 points Severe 5 points Extrme
1.How much difficulty do you have with sitting on or standing from a low chair?

Element.Name: 1、你从较低的椅子上站起来或做下去有多少困难？

Element.Text: 2.How much difficulty do you have with opening the medicine bottle?
3.How much difficulty do you have with buying food or anything else in shops?

Element.Name: 3、你去商店买食品或其他东西有多少困难？

Element.Text: 4.How much difficulty do you have with walking up stairs?
5.How much difficulty do you have with clenching your fists?
6.How much difficulty do you have with walking in or out of the bathroom (shower or washing in the bathtub)?

Element.Name: 6、你出入浴室（淋雨或浴缸）时有多少困难？

Element.Text: 7.How much difficulty do you have with sleeping comfortablely?
8.How much difficulty do you have with bending down or kneeling?

Element.Name: 8、你弯下腰或跪下来有多少困难？

Element.Text: 9.How much difficulty do you have with buttoning, hanging or zippering?

Element.Name: 9、你用纽扣、挂钩、按扣或拉链有多少困难？

Element.Text: 10.How much difficulty do you have with cutting nails?

Element.Name: 10、你剪自己的指甲有多少困难？

Element.Text: How much difficulty do you have with wearing your clothes?
12.How much difficulty do you have with walking?
13.How much difficulty do you have with standing up from chair or bed?

Element.Name: 13、你坐下或躺下后站起来有多少困难？

Element.Text: 14.How much difficulty do you have with going outside along?
15.How much difficulty do you have with driving?
16.How much difficulty do you have with drying yourself after shower?
17.How much difficulty do you have with opening doors or rolling down car windows?

Element.Name: 17、你在拧把手比如说开门、摇下车窗有多少困难？

Element.Text: 18.How much difficulty do you have with writing or typing?
19.How much difficulty do you have with body rotation?
20.How much difficulty do you have with ordinary sports activities including riding bikes, jogging or walking?

Element.Name: 20、你做一般的体育活动比如骑自行车、慢跑或走时有多少困难？

Element.Text: 21.How much difficulty do you have with daily recreational activities including handicraft, gardening, playing poker or walking with friends?

Element.Name: 21、你做日常的休闲活动比如消遣、手工艺、园艺、打扑克或和朋友出去散步时有多少困难？

Element.Text: 22.How much difficulty do you have with sex?
23.How much difficutly do you have with easy domestic duties including vacuuming, washing dishes or watering flowers?

Element.Name: 23、你做较轻的家务劳动如除尘、洗盘子或浇花有多少困难？

Element.Text: 24.How much difficulty do you have with heavy domestic duties including wiping floor, vacuuming or mowing?

Element.Name: 24、你做较重的家务劳动如擦地板、吸尘或修剪草坪有多少困难？

Element.Text: 25.How much difficulty do you have with daily work, domestic duties or voluntary activities?

Element.Name: 25、你做日常工作如有偿劳动、家务劳动或志愿活动时有多少困难？

Element.Text: Part II：How often do you have the following problems caused by damage or arthritis?
1 point never 2 points sometimes 3 points often 4 points most of my time 5 points always
27.Do you often avoid using painful waist or limbs?

Element.Name: 26、你经常避免使用疼痛的腰或肢体吗？

Element.Text: 28.Do you often walk with unstable steps?
29.Do you often feel hard to focus on anything?
30.Do you often feel that too much work in a day will lead to the low efficiency in works on next day?

Element.Name: 29、你经常由于前一天做了太多的事情而影响第二天做事吗？

Element.Text: 31.Do you often easily criticize or seriously respond others?

Element.Name: 30、你经常对周围的人情绪不好吗，比如说轻易的批评、尖刻的回答等？

Element.Text: Do you often feel depressed with any hurt or arthritis?

Element.Name: 33、你经常因为受过伤或有关节炎而感到生气或有挫折感吗？

Element.Text: Part III: Consider to what degree your aility has been affected by the following problems originated from damage or arthritis
1 point never 2 points mild 3 points moderate 4 points severe 5 points extreme
38.Taking shower, wearing clothes,walking into bathroom or other personal activities

Element.Name: 37、洗澡、穿衣服、去卫生间或其他个人活动的问题

Element.Text: 41.Getting along with friends, families or other important people in daily living

Element.Name: 40、和朋友、家人或其他生活中重要的人相处的问题
41、思考、集中精力或记忆力方面的问题

Element.Text: 43.Mental regulation in dealing with damage or arthritis

Element.Name: 42、应对损伤或关节炎时心理调节方面的问题

Info.ID: 西南医院量表\肌肉骨骼功能评分简表（SMFA）

XTextDocument.BodyText:
Name： Sex： Age： Dept: Bed No: Visit No:
Item Score Part I：How much difficulty do you have with the damage or arthritis on your physical conditions in your daily living of this week 1 point None 2 points Mild 3 points Moderate 4 points Severe 5 points Extrme 1.How much difficulty do you have with sitting on or standing from a low chair? 2.How much difficulty do you have with opening the medicine bottle? 3.How much difficulty do you have with buying food or anything else in shops? 4.How much difficulty do you have with walking up stairs? 5.How much difficulty do you have with clenching your fists? 6.How much difficulty do you have with walking in or out of the bathroom (shower or washing in the bathtub)? 7.How much difficulty do you have with sleeping comfortablely? 8.How much difficulty do you have with bending down or kneeling? 9.How much difficulty do you have with buttoning, hanging or zippering? 10.How much difficulty do you have with cutting nails? 11.How much difficulty do you have with wearing your clothes? 12.How much difficulty do you have with walking? 13.How much difficulty do you have with standing up from chair or bed? 14.How much difficulty do you have with going outside along? 15.How much difficulty do you have with driving? 16.How much difficulty do you have with drying yourself after shower? 17.How much difficulty do you have with opening doors or rolling down car windows? 18.How much difficulty do you have with writing or typing? 19.How much difficulty do you have with body rotation? 20.How much difficulty do you have with ordinary sports activities including riding bikes, jogging or walking? 21.How much difficulty do you have with daily recreational activities including handicraft, gardening, playing poker or walking with friends? 22.How much difficulty do you have with sex? 23.How much difficutly do you have with easy domestic duties including vacuuming, washing dishes or watering flowers? 24.How much difficulty do you have with heavy domestic duties including wiping floor, vacuuming or mowing? 25.How much difficulty do you have with daily work, domestic duties or voluntary activities? Part II：How often do you have the following problems caused by damage or arthritis? 1 point never 2 points sometimes 3 points often 4 points most of my time 5 points always 26.Do you often walk with limp? 27.Do you often avoid using painful waist or limbs? 28.Do you often walk with unstable steps? 29.Do you often feel hard to focus on anything? 30.Do you often feel that too much work in a day will lead to the low efficiency in works on next day? 31.Do you often easily criticize or seriously respond others? 32.Do you often feel tired? 33.Do you often feel disabilty? 34.Do you often feel depressed with any hurt or arthritis? Part III: Consider to what degree your aility has been affected by the following problems originated from damage or arthritis 1 point never 2 points mild 3 points moderate 4 points severe 5 points extreme 35.Hands, arms or legs 36.Waist 37.working in the neighborhood 38.Taking shower, wearing clothes,walking into bathroom or other personal activities 39.Sleeping or taking rest 40.Recreational or sports activities 41.Getting along with friends, families or other important people in daily living 42.Thinking, focusing or memory 43.Mental regulation in dealing with damage or arthritis 44.Daily work 45.Acting defensive to others 46.Stiffness or pain Category Calculation Method Score Daily activities（3，14，15，20-25，33） （total scores -10）/40×100 -25 Emotional condition（7,27,29,30-32,34） （total scores -7）/28×100 -25 Arms and hands function（2,5,9,10,11,16-18） （total scores -8）/32×100 -25 Movement condition（1,4,6,8,12,13,19,26,28） （total scores -9）/36×100 -25 Function index（1-34） （total scores -34）/136×100 -25 Problem index（35-46） （total scores -12）/48×100 -25
